mapper.insert: INSERT INTO evaluation_logic (evaluation_no, score, original_no, evaluating_date, user_id, comment) VALUES (uuid(), #{SCORE}, #{original_no}, now(), #{user_id}, #{COMMENT} );
INSERT INTO evaluation_Project (evaluation_no, score, project_no, evaluating_date, user_id, comment) VALUES (uuid(), #{SCORE}, #{project_no}, now(), #{user_id}, #{COMMENT} );
mapper.select: select count(e.evaluation_no) sum, count(e2.evaluation_no) sumOfAccept from (select * from evaluation_logic) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from evaluation_logic where score = 'Accept' ) e2 on e.evaluation_no = e2.evaluation_no where e.original_no = #{original_no};

select count(e.evaluation_no) sum, count(e2.evaluation_no) sumOfAccept from (select * from evaluation_Project) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from evaluation_Project where score = 'Accept' ) e2 on e.evaluation_no = e2.evaluation_no where e.project_no = #{project_no};
select * from evaluation_Logic where original_no = #{original_no} and user_id = #{user_id};
select * from evaluation_Project where project_no = #{project_no} and user_id = #{user_id};
